And then place some pieces of cloth or wool around the ear canal and pull the ear away from its attachment, as these movements often dislodge the causes behind these issues.
E si no n’es getada, lahoras aministra extraccio de lu am le instrument apelat gesti epicicarios subtil del qual aquesta es la forma:	If it is not dislodged, then administer the extraction of it with the instrument called a delicate epichiric forceps, of which this is the form:
E si es foro-getada am gesti, bo es; e sino, lahoras aministra la extraccio de lu am onci subtil de pauca duplicacio.	And if it is dislodged with the forceps, then it is good; otherwise, administer the extraction of it with a very thin instrument with slight curvature.
E donc si no es foro-getada per aquo, lahoras fay una canula de aram e entromet la extremitat de la canula en le trauc de la aurelha e claus a l’enviro de la canula am cera e am oli mollificada per so que no sia ubert sino la canula.	And therefore, if it is not forgotten, make a cannula of linen and insert the end of the cannula into the channel of the ear, closing around the cannula with wax and soft oil so that only the cannula opens.
E aprop extratz am le tieu vent am fort atraccio, quar tropas veguadas cum aquo que havem recontat.	And then extract the tongue with great force, as it is often seen with what we have described.
Mays si no es foro-getada en aquesta manieyra, lahoras pren de halka alumbat o de vecz aparelhat am le qual son preses les ausels una patita quantitat, e pausa aquel en la extremitat de ray, e aprop envolopa sobre aquel coto decentment pausat.	If this method is forgotten, take a piece of hot embers or a torch with which the outsides of the limbs are gently heated, and place that on the end of the ray, then neatly wrap it around.
E aprop entromet aquel en le trauc de la aurelha am facilitat, e aprop excicca la aurelha de la humiditat.	Then insert it into the ear canal with ease, and carefully dry the ear from moisture.
E donc si no es foro-getada am totas las causas las quals havem recontadas, lahoras tu coyta a talhar aquela denant que endevengua apostema caut o espasme.	And therefore, if all the causes we have described are not forgotten, then quickly tie off that which causes abscess or spasms.
E la manieyra de talhar aquela es que tu al comensament sancnes le malaute de la vena sephasica e extratz del sanc segon la mannieyra de la vertut de lu, e aprop fay aquel cezer entre las tuas mas e converteys l’aurelha a las partidas desus, e fen am petita fissura en la razit de la aurelha deves lo greys de lu en le loc be premegut de lu.	And the method of cutting is that you begin by cauterizing the infection from the saphenous vein and extract the pus according to the nature of its virtue, then make an incision between your fingers and turn the edge away from the parts above, and make a small fissure at the base of the edge where the greasiness of the pus has been most pressed against it.
E sia la fissura de figura lunar entro que pervengua a la peyra, e, la peyra atrobada, osta aquela si podes am instrumentz apropriatz; e aprop cos la fissura en aquela hora am velocitat, e cura aquela entro que sia sanat.	And if the fissure extends to the pear (testicle), and when the pear is swollen, you can stop it with an appropriate instrument; then quickly apply pressure to the fissure at that time to heal it.
E si la causa cazent en la aurelha es un dels gras que creysso e so inflatz, lahoras aministra la curacio e la extraccio de lu; mays si no obezeys a tu ad eyssiment, lahoras tu pren spatum teune subtil segon aquesta forma:	And if the cause of the pain in the auricle is one of the grasses that have grown and are inflamed, then administer treatment and extract it; but if you do not follow your own advice, then take some thin sponge according to this form:
e aministra am aquel la abscizio de aquel gra lo qual es cazut en l’aurelha.	and administer the removal of that grass which has fallen into the auricle.
E no fassas aquo quan cogitas que aquel ja es humectat per la vapor del aurelha, e pausa aquel en motas pessas, e prop extratz ne aquelas am les oncis o am gesti subtil, o ab inscizio ayssi co dit havem, quar es alleujada la extraccio de lu.	And do not attempt this when you think the affected area is already moistened by heat, place it on heavy weights, or try to extract it with scissors or subtle movements, or through incision as we have said, for it eases the extraction.
Mays en l’aygua la qual es intrada en l’aurelha cove que·l malaute use de sternutacio am condizi al comensament, e omple la sieua aurelha am alcu coto vielh, e jagua sobre aquela aurelha en la qual es l’aygua, e si per aquo es foro-getada, bo es; e sino, lahoras pren tropas peyras teunas e leons segon la longitut del dit, e calfa aquelas en le foc un pauc, e le pacient entrometa una de aquelas en le trauc de la sua aurelha e saute sobre la un pe sieu de aquela partida e percussia am una autra peyra sobre la peyra la qual es dintz la aurelha.	In the water that enters the ear, it is important to understand that the disease often starts with sneezing, and the inner ear should be filled with some soft substance up to a certain extent. Then, place your hot hand on the affected ear and if the water is expelled through this method, it is successful. Otherwise, take a few peals of eggs or lemon and slightly warm them in the fire, and then place one of these between the patient's fingers and press hard against the ear canal.
Donc no cesse aquo am peyra entro que tota l’aygua sia foro-getada.	Therefore, do not stop until all the water is expelled.
E ja l’aygua sira foro-getada enayssi que tu prenguas de papier o de gonc i, e met la una extremetat de lu en l’aurelha e estendas l’autre extremitat am foc entro que sia comburit le may de lu.	And already the water has been drawn off so that you take some paper or cloth, and place one end of it in the ear and extend the other end over the fire until the entire length is burned.
E prop met i autre gonc e fay aquo tantas veguadas entro que tota l’aygua sia foro-getada, e stratz aquel am canula ayssi co desus es dit de la peyra extrasadora.	Then place another cloth and repeat this process until all the water is drawn out, and strip off that one with the cannula as they say the water drawer.
Mays en la extraccio de bestia intrant en aquela aurelha, si es a petit cos, ayssi piussa e a lu semblant, cura aquel ayssi cum havem dit en la divisio; mays si es de gran cos la qual causa apar al sen del vezement, lahoras aministra la extraccio de lu am gesti e oncis, e la causa de lu es pus leugiera de totas las autras causas que cazo en l’aurelha.	In the extraction of a foreign body from an ear, if it is small and resembles one, it should be treated as we have said in division; but if it is of great size which causes appearance at the sense of disease, then administer the extraction of it by gesture and incision, and the cause of it is pus more lightly than all other causes that catch in the ear.
Mays en la extraccio de verm engendrat en la aurelha, quan tu curas aquel am aquo que havem dit en la divisio e en le tractat de distillacios e no comfereys la tua curacio, lahoras cove que tu reguardes la aurelha al solelh.	In the extraction of worms generated in the ear, when you treat it with the methods we have said in division and in the treatment of distills, and do not agree with your care, then take care to watch the ear towards the sun.
E donc si apar aqui alcuna causa dels verms, lahoras extratz aquel am gesti o am onci subtils, mays si no apar deguna causa, lahoras pren una canula dejos streyta e desus ampla de la qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And therefore, if any cause of the worms appears here, then extract them with careful or subtle gestures, but if no cause appears, take a tube that is narrow at one end and wide at the other, which is the form of it.
E entromet la extremitat subtil en la aurelha segon la quantitat la qual suffertar puesca le malaute; e aprop sucgeys am aquela per succio fort, e fay aquo motas veguadas, entro que totz les verms sian foro-gitatz.	Then insert the extremely subtle end into the ear according to the amount of suffering from the malady; then suck it with a strong suction, and do this in turns, until all worms are expelled.
Mays si no obezeysso a tu al ayssiment, lahoras tu opila e claus en le circuit de la canula am cera ayssi cum havem dit; lahoras aministre distillacios las quals han ja esproadas les antics en la curacio dels verms, e atrobaras aquo en le tractat de distillacios.	If you do not follow this method, then seal and close the tube in the circle of the ear with wax as we have said; administer distills which have already been prepared in the treatment of worms, and you will find this in the treatise on distills.
E sia la tua efusio am la qual efundas les olis medicinas en la aurelha am aquest strument del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And your flow of oil with which you pour medicinal oils into the ear, is with this instrument, whose form is as follows:
E fay aquela de argent o de eram, dejos streyt, en le qual sia un petit trauc, e am pla desus.	And make a small, narrow incision in silver or iron, leaving it open, and place a plate over it.
E donc sia cum empellent a que es en la conquavitat de la canula de continent aqui on sira necessari.	And so it is with what is in the cavity of the container here, it will be necessary.
E si vols, pren le ray e envolveys en la extremitat de lu decentment coto, e aprop gieta oli en la concavitat del auziment, o suc de alcuna herba, o aquo que vols de aquestas medicinas en la canula — e aquela es en la aurelha —, e aprop entromet le ray am coto desus e exprem am la tua ma aquel am compressio temprada de lu entro que l’oli sia expellit en la concavitat del auziment e le malaute senta le oli dedintz.	And if you wish, take the ray and wrap it around the end decently close, and then pour oil into the cavity of the hearing aid, or some herbal juice, or whatever you choose from these medicines into the canula — in the ear —, and then insert the ray under the skin and press with your hand to make a compressed wound so that the oil is expelled into the cavity of the hearing aid and the patient feels the oil inside.
E aquo que sia enfundut en la aurelha sia ja scalfat am foc un petit.	And what is inserted into the ear should already be softened with a small amount of fire.
E guarda te que la causa la qual distillaras en l’aurelha no sia trop frega, quar las medicinas de aurelha no suffertan aquo.	And be careful that the cause which you have distilled in the ear is not too severe, because the ear medications do not tolerate this.
Capitol .vii.	Capital .VII.
De curacio de opilacio de aurelhas.	On the treatment of earache.
Alcunas veguadas alcus enfantz yeysso dels ventres de lors mayres no-perforatz, e aquo ja accideys en alcus homes, opilacio en le meat de la aurelha per plagua o per carn nada en aquela; e aquesta opilacio alcunas veguadas es fayta en le preon del trau de la aurelha la qual no consiec le vezement, e alcunas veguadas es en las partidas defora.	Sometimes certain children have an inflammation of their parents' bellies that is not perforating, and this also happens in some adults, an inflammation of the tissue inside the ear due to a plague or a wound, nothing external; and sometimes this inflammation is in the area surrounding the hole of the ear, which is not always apparent.
E aquela que accideys en le preon de lu, la qual no comprehen le vezement, es en las majors disposicios de dificil sanacio.	And those that occur in the area surrounding it, which do not comprehend the cause, are in the most difficult situations for healing.
E en aquela en qual consegueys le vezement, cove que tu pauses la aurelha del malaute al solelh e reguarda en aquela.	And in those where you can perceive the cause, take the patient's ear to the sunlight and examine it.
E donc si vezes oppulacio apparent, obre aquela am espatum subtil del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And therefore, if an abundance appears, open that delicate blade of which this is the shape.
Si’ la extremitat de lu en la qual sia petita la latitut, del qual la una partida sia aguda e l’autra no; e le spatum sia de dos latz leon per so que no fassa lizio al aurelha.	If the extremity of the blade where the width is required has one side sharp and the other not; and the blade is of two lengths to prevent it from cutting into the skin.
E donc si la opilacio es per carn nascuda en la aurelha o en le meat de lu, lahoras te aquela am oncis subtils e incidiys aquela vehement facilitat entro que sia ostada tota la carn.	And therefore, if the enlargement is due to flesh grown in the earl or in the body of the blade, then take those delicate scissors and cut with a sharp ease until all the flesh is removed.
E si opilacio es en le preon de la aurelha, lahoras pren ray subtil leon e escalfa aquel am foc un pauc, e aprop met aquel en le meat de l’aurelha.	And if the enlargement is in the root of the earl, then take a thin knife and heat it with a little fire, and then insert it into the flesh of the earl.
E donc si as scentit oppulacio am aquo que le malaute atroba am facilitat, per gravetat de ausir, esforsa la oppressio de lu am facilitat; e guarda te que no plagues les nervis del aurelha.	And therefore, if you have sensed an enlargement as something that the patient finds easy to remove, due to its urgency, exert pressure on it to facilitate its removal; and be careful not to hurt the nerves of the earl.
E aprop pausa en l’aurelha drap de li segon la quantitat del ample del trauc lo qual tu as envolvutz en l’enguent egipciac; e fay aquo per alcus jorns entro que sias segur de la consolidacio de la plagua; o que prenguas qualgua e enfon aquela en ayguaros e pulveriza sobre lu segi trissat e usa de lu; e si vezes la aurelha ja esser apostemada, lahoras cove que tu estraguas la qualgua e permutes aquela am autra qualgua la qual tu envoloparas en cerot que sia fayt am oli rozat, entro que sia le apostema caut cedat; e aprop cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	And then place it (the cloth) on the affected area according to the width of the wound you have wrapped with the Egyptian ointment; do this for several days until you are certain of the healing of the ulcer or take some and pour it into waters and sprinkle over it after every third day and use it; if the ulcer has already formed a crust, be careful not to destroy the water and replace it with another water that you wrap in cloth that is made of oil or grease, until the sore cauterized wound yields. And then tend to it so that it heals.
Mays si accideys flux de sanc, lahoras submergeys esponga o drap en aygua frega e pausa sobre la aurelha, e usa del autra curacio la qual restrengeys le flux del sanc, la qual es dita en le tractat de distillacio.	If a flow of pus occurs, then immerse a clean cloth or drape in hot water and place it on the affected area, and use another treatment that you have prepared to stop the flow of pus, as mentioned in the distillation treatise.
Capitol .viii.	**Chapter VIII**
De cura de athezil le qual endeveno a las palpebras.	On the treatment of atherosclerosis affecting the eyelids.
Athezil les quals endeveno a las paupebras dels huels alcuna veguada so humitz, alscunas veguadas son secs.	Moisturize the eyelids of the eyes sometimes become dry, sometimes moist.
Donc cove que tu tenguas aquels am tenhalhas o am onci, e inscindas aquels am espatum de las suas razitz, e aprop pausa sobre les locs segi trissat.	So it is necessary that you have these tools or scissors, and cut off the rough edges from their roots, and then place your hand over the affected areas.
Mays si dolor am flux de sanc veno, lahoras tu cauteriza aquels am cauteri lanticular subtil.	If the pain flows with hot blood venously, then you should cauterize them with a subtle antilithic cautery.
E la milhor cauterizacio es aprop las inscizios e tropas veguadas retornam quan reman alcuna causa de sas razitz; e quan so cauterizadas am foc, aquelas razitz son comburidas e no retornan.	And the best cautery is to make incisions and return them when there is no cause for their roots; and when cauterized with fire, those roots are consumed and do not return.
Capitol .ix.	Chapter IX.
Cura de grandeyssa que veno a las palpebras dels huels.	Treatment for a severe condition that comes to the eyelids of the eyes.
Motas veguadas endeve en las palpebras dels huels alcuna causa la qual es asemblada a grandissa en sa fortalicia e duricia, e per so grandissia es apelada.	Motas visible on the eyelids of the eyes, caused by some condition, resemble great strength and hardness, hence they are called cataracts.
E es agreguacio de humiditat grossa en la palpebra dejos e desus.	And there is an addition of thick moisture on the lower and upper eyelids.
Donc la opperacio en lor es que consideras lahoras si la grandissia es procedent en lu en aquo que apar de la palpebra e es mauguda a tota partida; e la causa de lu es leugiera.	Therefore, the operation on them considers when the great size is proceeding from what appears on the eyelid and is reduced entirely; and the cause of it is slight.
Donc fen sobre aquela am fissura per la latitut, e aprop escorga aquela de tota partida am facilitat entro que evasesca, e aprop suspen aquela am onci e abscindeys aquela.	Therefore, cut along that narrow fissure, and extrude it entirely with ease, and then suspend that one from above, and cut and separate that.
Mays si a tu no es apparelhada la incizio de lu si no pus que penetras la palpebra am inscizio pauc a pauc, lahoras aquo no notz en deguna causa.	But if you are not equipped with the beginning of it, but only penetrate the eyelid with a slight incision, then this will not notice any cause.
E si la figura es gran, lahoras tu l’ajusta am sutura; e cura aquela entro que sia sanada.	And if the swelling is large, you adjust it with a stitch; and treat it until it heals.
E si es pauca, a tu no sobrevindra mal per aquela quar l’anguent de lu restaura aquela e encarna.	And if it is minor, you will not suffer greatly because the heat of the poultice restores and incarnates it.
E si la grandissia es declinant a las partidas dedintz de la palpebra deves la superficia dedintz, lahoras evesa la palpebra e suspen la grandissia am onci, otra que tu indigescas de incizio, e prem aquela de tota part, e si la palpebra per inscizio es alonguada, aquo no notz en deguna causa.	And if the enlargement is decreasing within the folds of the eyelid, you must remove the surface, lift the eyelid, and suspend the enlargement with a stitch, other than what you initially desired, and press it from all sides; and if the eyelid itself is elongated for some reason, this should not be noticed in any case.
E aprop la incizio, lava le huel am aygua salada; e cura le loc am aquo que encarna entro que sia sanat.	Then make the incision, wash the wound with salt water; and treat the area with hot compresses until it heals.
Capitol .x.	Chapter X.
De la cura axcirnah en la palpebra desus del huel.	Regarding the treatment of the eyelid above the eye.
Axcirnath es grays le qual es engendrat en las tunicas de la palpebra desus, e majorment endeve als enfantz, agrava les huels de aquels et accideyso a lor catartz le mayti; e no podon reguardar la claror del solelh per aquo quar lagremas se coytan ad aquels.	Axcirnath is an inflammation caused by the growth in the layers of the eyelid above, and it most often appears in children, aggravating their eyes and leading to their discharge; and due to this, they cannot see the clarity of the sun as tears accumulate on their eyes.
E per so tu vezes aquels jaser sobre les lors caras tot temps, e sobre les lors caras dormen; e so a las palpebras de lor dejos les sobrecils humidas, las quals ja ha cuberta imflacio, e iminencia de accernac apparent es en l’uelh; e que quant tu premes le loc am les tieus ditz, tu centes accernac entro aquels.	And so you apply these to their faces all the time and while they sleep; and as a result, the eyebrows on their eyelids become moistened, already covering inflammation, and the imminent occurrence of discharge appears in the eye; and when you press the area with your fingers, you feel acuteness within those.
E alcuna manieyra de opperacio es en aquel que le malaute pausa le sieu cap en le tieu se, e aprop pausa drap de li e de lu fay calgua, e fay de lu cercle segon la quantitat la qual contena arthernach de tota partida, e aprop pausa aquel sobre aquela e prem am les tieus ditz de tota per que sia agreguat arcernac en le mieg del cercle, e aprop fen en le mieg de aquela humiditat am spatum inscident am fissura per la latitut, e la fissura no sia major que la fissura que es fayta en flaubotomia.	And certain techniques of operation are used when the hernia is in the thigh, and a cloth is placed over it and cold applied; then the hernia is formed according to the amount that contains the seed from all sides, and the aforementioned is placed on top of it and pressed with your fingers throughout so that discharge accumulates in the middle of the ring, and then ends in the middle of the other by applying a humid spatum to the fissure according to its extent, and the fissure should not be larger than the one made in flaubotomia.
Mays en le preon cove que tu fendas la codena tota entro que pervenguas ad arcernach, quar en las mays desposicios proceseys arcernach per fissura segon la forma de grayseza blanca.	Place the heated knife in the opening and completely cut through until you reach the cavity, for in the most advanced cases, the cavity itself is blocked by a white, grainy deposit.
Donc extratz aquela am draps los quals tu as envolopatz entre les tieus ditz a las partidas deforo e revolv entre la ma dextra e sinistre entro que sia dispargut.	Then extract those rags that you have wrapped around the affected parts outside and twist them between your right and left hand until they are completely severed.
E guarda te que no ajustes en la fissura per so que am le spatum no pervenguas al huel e ladescas aquel.	And be careful not to pull back the edges of the opening, so that the spatulum does not go beyond and tear it.
Mays si no apar a tu arternach en le comensament de la fissura, mays que tu ajustes en la fissura un petit am fecilitat entro que procesisca arternach; e aprop extratz aquela ayssi quo havem dit; e aprop submargeys draps de li en aygua e vi agre e pausa les sobre le loc e estrenh aquels am polvils.	If it does not appear to your assistant at the beginning of the fissure, then adjust the fissure a little more easily until the process begins; and then extract those rags that we have mentioned; and subsequently immerse them in water and vinegar, apply pressure over the area, and sprinkle on some powders.
E so alcus que trissan sal e pausan aquel en la conquavitat de la fissura per so que aquo que es remas de aquela humiditat.	And then some who squeeze salt and place it in the cavity of the fissure to draw out that which is removed by that moisture.
E aprop cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	And then attend to that inside which must be healed.
Mays si accideys en le loc apostema caut, lahoras cura aquel am emplastres cedatils entro que sia sanat.	If it happens at the infected site with caution, then treat it with plaster until it heals.
Capitol .xi.	Chapter XI.
De manieyras de tactimi del huel.	On the ways of examining through touch.
Quan en las palpebras dels huels so natz pels ajustatz dejos les pels naturals e so antiquatz, lahoras aquels noso al huel e fan endevenir manieras de malautias ayssi cum lacrimas assiduas e mollificacio de palpebras e tela entro que aquo sia causa de destruccio del huel que s’apela tactinir del huel, e cura se en quatre manieyras: o per cauteri am foc; o am medicina acuta segon que denant es dit en le capitol de cauteri; o es fayt atactini per inscizio e sutura; o per cannas segon que yeu diyre.	When in the eyelids of the eyes there are growths due to natural aging, and these become painful, causing constant tears and softening of the eyelids, which leads to the destruction of the eye that is called "tactinir of the eye," and its cure is in four ways: either with a pointed cautery over fire; or with acute medicine as mentioned previously in the chapter on cauterization; or by incising and stitching them; or with canes, as I will explain.
E donc cove que tu pauses le cap del malaute en le tieu se; aprop converteys la palpebra del uelh am la tua ma sinistra, e si es convertida, bo es; e sino, entromet agulha en aquela en la qual sia fiel de la partida pus dejos de la palpebra, e fay penetrar la agulha am fiel desus, e aquo sia — prop del marge de la palpebra en le qual naysso les pels — prop dels pels, e tira le fiel a las partidas desus am la palpebra, e converteys aquela am le ray.	And so take care to place the head of the patient in a low position; then turn the eyelid with your left hand, and if it turns, that is good; otherwise, insert a needle into the area where the lid is stuck, and let the needle penetrate through the thread onto the lid, close to the edge of the eyelid where there are no hairs, and pull the thread away from the lid and turn it to the side.
E aprop fen en la partida dedintz de la palpebra dejos les pels ajustatz am spatum inscidentz del lacrimal major entro al lacrimal mendre; e aprop extratz le fiel e pausa dejos la palpebra polvilhs petitz de coto o de drap, e aprop senha sobre la palpebra am tenta, e sia ayssi cum figura de fuelha de mirt.	Then, within the gap between the eyelid and the hairs, carefully cut with a scalpel the thread that joins the greater lacrimal to the lesser; remove the thread and place the eyelid gently using small cotton or cloth swabs, then press it firmly with your finger, forming a shape like a mitten.
Mays empero cove que sia la figura segon la quantitat de helevacio de la palpebra, quar aquo ja es diversificat en les homes, quar de aquels es le quals indigeys que sia inscidit de la palpebra gran quantitat segon la quantitat per la qual la palpebra es mollificada.	However, it is important to consider that the shape should be adjusted according to the amount of swelling in the eyelid, as this varies among individuals; those with greater swelling will require a deeper cut into the eyelid.
E aprop fen am le spatum sobre las doas linhas las quals has senhadas, e comensa del lacrimal major entro al lacrimal menor.	And then cut open the space between the two lines that you have identified, starting from the lacrimal gland greater to the lacrimal gland lesser.
E si’ la tua fissura prop dels pels naturals ayssi cum es la grossetut del rey.	And if your fracture is near the natural hairline, it should be treated with equal severity as that of a king.
E aprop met le onci en un dels dos angles de la codena, e aprop excoria aquela tota, e aprop ajusta am la scitura las doas labias am gula o fiel de lana subtil, e abstergeys le sanc, e fay adherir aquo que superflueys dels fiels sobre dos sobrecils am alcunas causas enviscans, si voles far aquo, e sino, non cures.	And then place the onion in one of the two angles of the wound, scrape it entirely, and adjust the stitching of the two lips with glue or fine wool, clean the pus, and make what is superfluous of the medications adhere to both eyebrows for certain reasons, if you wish, but if not, do not treat it.
E aprop leyssa la sutura dels fiels entro a tres dias o quatre, e aprop cura aquo.	And then, after three or four days, examine the stitching of the medications and take care of it.
E si vols, layssa la plagua ses sutura, e cura aquela am aquo que exsicca e constrenh, quar la palpebra es alevada deves la sigillacio de la plagua e la agreguacio de lu; mays sutura es milor E donc aysso diysso les antics de taxanir.	And if you wish, leave the plague open without stitching, and treat it with what dries and constricts, because the eyelid is lifted due to the sealing of the plague and the addition of medications; but more stitching is better. Thus, I have told you the ancient remedies for this.

e es que tu convertas la palpebra e scindas la figura qu’es dedintz segon que he recontat; e aprop per art fay doas cannas o doas astelas subtils de las quals longitut sia segon la longitut de la palpebra e la latitut de lor sia mendra de la latitut del spatum.	and it is that you turn the eyelid and divide the figure within according to what I have mentioned; then, using a needle or two thin splints whose length corresponds to the length of the eyelid and whose width is proportional to the width of the space, do as follows:

Capitol .xx.	Chapter XX.
De reduccio de la eminencia del huel.	For the reduction of the hernia's bulge.

Capitol .xxii.	Chapter XXII.
De curacio de alconati.	On the treatment of eyes.

E per aquo cove que tu inscidas aquel en le comensament de la apparissio de lu, e erediques tot aquel.	And for this reason, you should pay attention to the beginning of its appearance and eradicate it entirely.
E aprop pausa sobre le loc o cauteri o medicina comburent la qual estia en loc de lu.	And then apply a heated cautery or medicine that burns over the area where it is located.
Mays si es tardada la sua inscizio entro que sia magnificat, lahoras considera si es lapificat, dur, de fusca color e de pauc sentiment, lahoras no toques aquel am ferr quar es apostema crancos; quar motas veguadas ad aquel que inscideys aquesta apostema endeve per lu granda malicia sobre aquel le qual aquel havia.	If the operation takes too long and becomes inflamed, consider if it is tender, hard, of a dark color, and has little sensation. Then do not touch that part with a hot iron because it is an abscessed cramp; for the pain experienced by anyone who incides this abscess is due to great harm to him or her.
E si le apostema es de leon tocament e no es de fosca color, e vezes que inscizio es possibla en tot aquel, lahoras evacua le malaute e inscideys aquel senes temor, e cura le loc am aquo que exsique e costrenh entro que sia sanat.	If the abscess is painful but not dark in color and the incision is possible in that area, then evacuate the pus and cut into it without much fear, and treat the place with a liquid that will drain and heal it until it is cured.
Capitol .xxvi.	**Chapter XXVI**
De sutura del nas e de las labias e de la aurelha quan la continuitat es dissolvuda per plagua o per semblantz.	On the suture of the nose, lips, and earlobe when the continuity is broken due to a wound or similar.
Sapias que quan accideys solucio de continuitat en una de aquestas cartillages, pauc confereys en aquela operacio sino en alcus homes.	You should know that when there is a rupture of continuity in one of these cartilages, it causes little concern in the operation on some people.
Donc cove, quan endeve ad alcu alcuna causa de aquelas, que consideres si es plagua fresca am le sieu sanc, e lahoras tu ajusta las doas labias de la plagua am sutura, e aprop cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	Therefore, when you encounter any cause of those, considering it a fresh plague or its corruption, then you adjust the two edges of the plague with sutures and subsequently care for the inside so that it heals.
E si las labias de solucio de continuitat so ja separadas, e quascuna es fayta sana, lahoras cove que tu excorjes quascuna partida de la sua codena apparent entro que n’iesca sanc.	And if the edges of the rupture of continuity are already separated and each part is healthy, then you must extract each segment from its neighboring tissue so that it does not become infected.
E aprop ajusta las doas labias am sutura e strenh aquelas, e sobre aquelas pulveriza sanc de drago e enses trissat, e pausa sobre la polvera una pessa de emplaustra diafinicon, o de alcu autre dels emplastres consolidatius, e leyssa aquel liat per dos jorns o per tres, e aprop deslia aquel e permuta aquel emplaustre e leyssa aquel entro que·ls fiels per si sian abscinditz, e aprop cura am enguent entro que sia sanat.	Then you adjust the two edges with sutures and strengthen them, and sprinkle dragon's blood and tripe on those, and place a piece of fine plaster or some other consolidative plaster over it, and leave it for two or three days, then remove that and replace the plaster and take care with ointment so that the wounds heal by themselves.
Mays la manieyra de la sutura es que tu agregues la solucio de continuitat o am agulhas ayssi cum havem recomtat en la sutura del ventre, o agregua la solucio de continuitat am fiel ayssi cum a tu e fayt saber.	The technique of suturing is that you add the solution for continuity with needles as we have recommended in the suturing of the abdomen, or add the solution for continuity with thread as it has been explained to you.
Capitol .xxvii.	**Capitol XXVII.**
De extraccio de aquela causas que veno en las doas labias en las partidas dedintz.	On the extraction of those causes that come in both lips during the divisions within.
Motas veguadas endeve a motz homes en las partidas dedintz de las suas labias alcus apostemas durs semblantz a gras de errs, e alscunas de lors son mendres e alcunas son majors.	You often observe various conditions in many individuals during the divisions within their lips; some have hard apothems resembling errant grays, and others have larger or smaller ones.
Donc cove que tu convertas las labias e fendas quascuna de aquelas duricias de tota part, e aprop la abscizio umpliscas le loc de sagi trissat entro que·l sanc sia restrengut, e aprop sia lavat am vi agre e sia curat le loc am aquo que es stipticitat, entro que sia sanat.	Therefore, you should remove the lips and cleave each of those hard conditions from every part, and then fill the void with a clean thread while the wound is still fresh, and afterwards wash it with wine and apply a poultice to the spot that has been punctured, until it heals.
Capitol .xxviii.	Chapter .xxviii.
De inscizio de la carn ajustada en las gengivas.	On the incision of tissue attached to the gums.
Granre de veguadas nays sobre la gengiva carn ajustada la qual les antics apelero albulus, adonc cove que tu suspendas aquela am onci o que tenguas aquela am las forfecs e inscidas aquela deves la sua razit, e leyssas la sania correr o le sanc.	Cutting tools should not be placed on the attached gum tissue that ancient physicians called "albulus". Therefore, you must either suspend it or hold it with forceps and make an incision along its edge, allowing the blood to flow or pus to drain.
E aprop pausa sobre le loc sagi trissat o autra polveras stipticas o excicativas.	And then apply pressure over the area with a compress or other astringent or caustic powders.
E si aquela carn retorna, lahoras inscideys aquela segundariament, e cauterisa aquela, quar aprop le cauteri no retornara.	And if that tissue returns, make another incision secondarily and cauterize it, for the cautery should not return.
Capitol .xxix.	Chapter .xxix.
De razo de dentz am ferr.	Due to the reason of teeth aching.
Quan en la superficia de las dentz de las partidas dedintz e de las de foro e entre las gingivas so ajustadas escorsas aspras, legas, e alcunas veguadas son de nigradas e son faytas citrinas o vertz entro que a la gingiva ve per aquo corrupcio e son faytas las dentz legas.	When on the surface of the teeth within and between the gums there are rough, sharp edges, some blackened and some discolored, due to this corruption penetrating the gums, and the neighboring teeth are also affected, they become citrine or green in color.
E donc cove que tu fassas sezer le malaute entre las tuas mas e pausar le cap de lu en le tieu se, e ratz las dents en las quals apareysso aquelas escorsas e causas semblantz arena entro que de lor no romangua deguna causa, e aquo fay de la negror e de la citrinitat e de las autras entro que sian mondificadas.	And so you should close the space between your thighs, place the head of the patient in a suitable position, and pull out the teeth where these rough edges appear, causing a similar sensation to sand, without any visible cause, and this leads to the darkness, citrinity, and other colors as they are cleansed.
Donc si es ostat aquo que es en aquelas del comensament de la razio, bo es; e sino, lahoras tu itera la razio sobre aquelas al autra dia e al segon e al tertz entro que vengua al derier stament en aquo que tu vols.	Therefore, if this remains as in the beginning of the reason, so be it; otherwise, you should repeat the reason about these to the other parts each day, and on the second and third days, until you reach the final statement in what you wish.
E sapias que las dentz han necessitat de motz rezoris de diversas formas e de motas figuras segon que es preparat a la tua operacio.	And you should know that teeth require various types of precise tools and shapes according to how they are prepared for your operation.
E per so quar le razori am le qual la dent es raza de la partida dedintz es autre del razori am le qual es ras entre las dentz segon autras formas, e aquestas formas de razoris sian deves tu preparadas las quals veyras tantost:	And for this reason, the tools with which a tooth is extracted from within are different from the tools used to extract teeth between each other, and these forms of tools that you will prepare should be as follows:
Capitol .xxx.	Chapter .xxx.
D’eradicacio de dentz.	Eradication of teeth.
Cove que tu cures la dent de la sua dolor am tot engen e tardes en tota eradicacio de lu, quar no es denguna causa que suplisqua la veguada de lu quan es eradicada, quar es sustancia sublima entro que es excusacio en la eradicacio de lu.	Understand that you cure the tooth from its pain with all possible care and time in its complete eradication, for there is no reason to replace it once it is extracted, as it is a sublime substance whose absence is the justification for its eradication.
Mays cove quan le malaute es forsat aquela dent eradicar, que fermament deves tu sia certificat quala es la dent dolent, quar motas veguadas la dolor descep le malaute e cuga que sia en dent sana, e tu eradicas aquela e aprop la dolor no cessa entro que la dent malauta e dolent sia eradicada, quar nos ja havem vist aquo per operacio dels barbies.	You may also understand that when the disease forces you to extract a tooth, it is essential that you are certain which tooth is causing the pain, as deceiving the pain can lead to mistaking a healthy tooth for a diseased one, and extracting the wrong tooth will not cease the pain until the diseased and painful tooth is eradicated, as we have seen this in the operations of barbies.
Donc cum deves tu es sertificat qual es la dent dolent, e que o sabes be, lahoras cove que tu scarifiques en le circuit de la dent am spatum en le qual sia alcuna vertut, entro que sia dissolvut de la dent de la gingiva de tota partida, e aprop mau aquel am les tieus ditz, o am forfexs subtils al comensament petit a petit entro que aquela concucesquas.	Therefore, once you have certified that the painful tooth is, and know it well, you will cover it with a spatula in which there is some virtue, until it is dissolved from the tooth of the gums entirely, and then carefully make incisions with your fingers or small forks, little by little, until the tooth falls out.
E aprop alogua en lu fortz tenalhas grans per bona loquacio o estuptura fort, e pausa le cap del malaute entre les tieus denolhs que be le tengues que no·s maugua, e aprop tratz la dent segon rectitut en manieyra que no trenques aquela, ni al malaute major dolor no dones.	And then use pliers with strong jaws for good speech or a firm bite, and place the patient's head between your hands that hold them, to prevent any injury, and carefully extract the tooth in such a way as not to break it, nor cause greater pain to the patient.
E donc si no es foro-getat, lahoras pren un de aquels instrumentz, e met aquel dejos lu de tota part am facilitat e esforsa la remocio de lu ayssi que es feyt al comensament.	And if that is not forgotten, then take one of those instruments and put it beside the tooth with all ease and effort to facilitate its removal as it was at the beginning.
Mays si la dent es trauquada o corrosa, lahoras cove que tu comples de drap aquel trauc e estrenguas aquel am la extremitat de ray subtil per so que no sia trinquada en la hora de la tua constriccio sobre aquela am tenalas.	But if the tooth is loose or corroded, you must cover that decay with a cloth and tighten it with the tip of a fine needle to prevent it from coming out when you apply pressure with your pliers.
E cove que tu obres exquesitament am scarificacio en le circuit de tota part de la gingiva e guarda mot la tua fortaleza que no trenques aquela e romangua partida de lu, e retorne sobre le malaute per la malicia que sia majo que la primieyra dolor de lu.	And be sure to perform the scarification carefully around the entire gingival margin, and maintain your strength so that you do not tear or break it open again, and return to the patient for further treatment if the malignity is greater than the initial pain of the condition.
E guarda te que no fassas aquo que fan alscus ignorantz barbiers en lor fistinacio e audacia sobre la eradicacio de lor, ses que no aministran aquo que nos havem recomtat; quar motas veguadas fan venir sobre les homes malautias grans las quals son pus dificils que sian trinquadas, e las razitz de lor remaugudas totas, o alcunas de aquelas, o que extrayguas aquela am alcus osses de la mandigula ayssi cum motas veguadas havem testificat.	And beware that you do not perform what some ignorant barbers do in their hasty and reckless attempts at removal, for these actions do not administer what we have recommended; indeed, they often bring about great illnesses in men, which are more difficult to cure, and the roots of these ailments, or some of them, or even certain bones from the mandible, as we have witnessed with our own eyes.
E aprop la eradicacio de lu sia lavada la boca am vi caut o vi agre am sal.	Then perform the eradication of it, wash your mouth with vinegar or salt water.
E si endeve fluxs de sanc per aysso, ayssi cum motas veguadas endeve, lahoras trissa alcuna quantitat de zegi e aspergeys sobre la plagua, e si no confereys aquel zegi, cauteriza.	And if pus flows from it, as is often the case, then, as we have witnessed, you should squeeze out some quantity of egg and sprinkle it over the wound, and if that egg is not available, apply a cautery.
La forma de las forceps e tenalas subtils am las quals es mauguda la dent al comensament sia de longua extramitat, de breu manubre e gros, per so que no sian doblatz quan am aquels deves obrar.	The design of the forceps should be delicate, with a fine grip, suitable for extracting a tooth from its beginning, both from the external part of the tongue and also from a short and thick manipulation, so that they do not bend when performing these tasks.
E sian ayssi cum vezes de gros manubre entro que quan estrenhas am aquelas no sian dobladas, sian breus extramitatz.	And they should also have thick handles for when you first use them, so that they are not bent; instead, their ends should be short.
E sian faytas de ferr de India descentment faytas de dreytas extramitatz, e en las extramitatz de aquelas sian dentz de las quals las unas intron en las autras e estrenhan per constriccio descent fort, e alscunas veguadas las extramitatz de aquelas sian la forma del bec d’un auzel le qual ha nom ciconia, so es guanta, e son de fort constriccio.	These are made of Indian iron with right-angled ends; on the ends of these are teeth that interlock with each other and start by strongly constricting descent, and sometimes the ends of these forceps take the form of a bird's beak, which is curved, and they are very strong.

De erradicacio de dentz e d‘estraccio dels osses de las mandibulas trincadas.	For the eradication of teeth and the removal of broken bones from the jaw.
Quan deves la eradicacio de dent le qual es trinquat roman alcuna causa, lahoras cove que tu pauses sobre le loc coto am boder per un jorn o per dos entro que·l loc sia mollificat; e aprop entromet algesti o tenalhas las extramitatz de las quals so asembladas al bec de un auzel apelat ciconia o guanta, la forma de las forceps:	When you need to eradicate a tooth that is stuck for any reason, you should place your hand over the area with a border for one or two days until the location becomes softened. Then insert some pliers or tongs whose ends are assembled in the shape of a beak of a bird called a ciconia or guanta, which resembles forceps.
Las extramitatz de lor sian faytas dedintz ayssi cum lima o alfagi.	The ends of them should be cut with a file or chisel.
E si no obediys a tu a eyssiment am aquestas forceps o tenalas, lahoras cove que tu caves sobre la razit e descrobas tota la carn e entrometas le instrument le qual ha nom atali, so es palanca petita del qual la forma es aquesta:	And if you do not obey the instructions regarding these pliers or tongs, then you should lie down and expose all the flesh, and insert the instrument which is called a small lever with this shape:
E sia de breu extremitat grossa un petit, e no sia enbegut per so que no sia trinquat.	It should have a short thick end and not be smoothed over so that it does not get stuck.
Donc si per aquo la razit es foro-getada, bo es; e sino, ajuda te am aquestz autres instrument dels quals aquestas son las formas: la forma del primier instrument es de triangulada extramitat en la qual sia alcuna grossesa:	Therefore, if the incision is forgotten, this is it; otherwise, help me with these other instruments, of which these are the forms: the form of the first instrument is triangular at its end, with some thickness.
La forma del segon instrument es que sia de triangulada e de pus subtil extremitat.	The form of the second instrument is triangular with a very thin end.

de la triangulada extremitat torta o curta, la qual sia alcuna grossesa, e no sia enbegut per so que no sia trinquat.	with a triangular end, either bent or straight, of certain thickness, and not encrusted so that it is not jagged.
E otra sapias que·ls instrumentz de las dentz motz so e semblantment les autres instruments.	And you should know that the tools for drawing teeth are similar in appearance to other instruments.
Mays le artifexs savi e subtil en l’art, atroba per si mateys segon aquo que a lu significa la operacio e las malautias diversas; quar son de las malautias a las quals les antics no diysero ni pausero propri instrument, per las formas de diversas specias.	The skilled and subtle artisans, through their own study, discover for themselves according to what the operation means and various ailments; for there are ailments to which the ancient ones did not give name or pause with their proper instruments, due to their diverse forms.
Mays si es trinquat l’os de la mandibula o dels autres osses de la boca, o si poyreys, lahoras sia pes curat sobre aquel en son loc am aquo que es a lu convenient dels instrumentz e de las forceps las quals havem dit en la extraccio de las razitz de las dentz, e ajuda te am gesti del qual aquesta es la forma:	If it is about the bone of the jaw or other bones in the mouth, or if there is a fracture, then apply gentle pressure to that area in its proper place using the instruments and forceps we have mentioned regarding the extraction of teeth, and assist with the gesture which this shape requires.
E sia en lu alcuna grosseza petit a petit, e sia instringida o tenguda am la boca per que no evasesca o fuga entro que l’os de tot sia foro-getat; e aprop restaura le loc am medicinas convenientz ad aquo.	And for any lump, little by little, and whether it is tightened or held in the mouth so that it does not escape or protrude until the bone is completely extracted, then restore the area with appropriate medicines.
Mays si en l’os es petita poyredura, lahoras ratz aquel de aquela poyredura e de la sua negror, e cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	If there is a small breach in the bone, then quickly remove that part and clean it, and treat it until it heals.
Capitol .xxxii.	**Capitol .xxxii.**
De la cura de las dentz eminentz sobre las autras.	On the care of the prominent teeth among others.
Quan las dentz so eminentz no segon lor cors natural per aquelas la forma es laga, e majorment quan endeve a las femnas, e majorment a las piuselas venerablas; donc cove que tu consideras: si dent es nada aprop autra dent, e no es possibla sarradura ni linament de lu, lahoras radica aquela; mays que no sia annexa am autra dent, lahoras tu inscideys aquela am aquest instrument del qual aquesta es la forma; e es semblant a morr de porc, e sia feyt de ferr de India de extramitat mot aguda.	When the teeth are prominent in an unnatural way due to their shape, particularly in women, especially young and chaste ones; then consider: if it is not possible to extract or clean that tooth, then root it out; rather than leaving it attached to another tooth, cut it off with this instrument which resembles a pig's tusk, made of Indian steel with an extremely sharp point.
E sia la tua inscizio am la qual inscideyses aquela en trops dias per la duricia de la dent, e que no sia comauguda autra de las dentz.	And your incision should be made in such a way that you cut off the tooth after several days due to the hardness of the tooth, and it should not affect any other teeth.
E si es dent eminent expausat a limadura, lahoras lima aquel am lima de ferr de India del qual aquesta es la forma:	And if the prominent tooth is exposed to friction, then file it with this iron lime file in the shape of:
E sia tot de ferr de India e·l margua eysament; e sia de motz menutz puntz ayssi cum lima am la qual son faytas agulhas, am la qual la dent sia limada pauc a pauc en motz dias am fecilitat, per so que no sia autra dent comauguda e caga.	And all of this is from Indian iron and the margin precisely; and it has many small points as if with a lime, whose edge is sharpened day by day easily, so that there is no other tooth like it that cuts and hurts.
E aprop lineys aquela en la fi, e ratz aquela am alscus razoris.	Then measure that at the end, and cut it with some other scissors.
E si es dent del qual una partida es trinquada e lideys la lengua, lahoras cove que tu limescas aquel entro que l’aspretat de aquela fraccio sia ostada e engualhada, e sia aplenada per so que la lengua no ledesca ni la paraula no corrumpa.	And if it is the tooth from which a piece has broken off and affects the tongue, then you must file that edge where the fracture's sharpness is trapped and embedded, and smoothen it so that the tongue does not get hurt or the word is not corrupted.
Capitol .xxxiii.	Capital (or Heading) .XXXIII.
De restauracio de dentz maugudas am fiel de aur o de argent.	On the restoration of lost teeth with gold or silver wire.
Quan accideys a las dentz devant concussio e remossio per percussio o per cazament, e le malaute no pot strenher sobre aquo que manga, e tu has curat aquel am medicinas stipticas, e no ha valgut la tua curacio, lahoras per so que no cagan es engen en aquelas que sian strengudas am fiel de aur e no de argent, quar argent se fa vert e aprop se poyreys aprop alscus dias, mays aur nul temps no es mudat.	When teeth are affected by concussion and removal due to impact or extraction, and the patient cannot bear the pain, having tried various stiptics, then one must resort to those that are tightened with gold wire, not silver, because silver corrodes and soon becomes useless, while gold remains unchanged forever.
E sia le fiel en tal subtilitat e grocesa segon la quantitat que puesca entrar entre las dentz; e la forma de la reccio es que prenguas le fiel e pren lo doble de lu entre doas dentz sanas, e aprop que cresques am doas tortuositatz del fiel entre doas maugudas, o si’ una o motas, entro que pervengua la tela a la dent sana del autra partida.	And the wire should be of such subtlety and thickness according to the amount that can fit between the teeth; the shape of the correction is to take the wire and bend it twice between two healthy teeth, or if there is only one or two gaps, ensure that the wire reaches the healthy tooth from the other side.
E aprop itera le teyssiment entro a la partida de la qual comenciest, e strenh la tua ma am facilitat e savieza entro que no sia mauguda.	Then repeat the stitching within the gap from which you began, and tighten your hand with facility and wisdom, lest it be damaged.
E sia la tua striccio am la qual strenhas le fiel deves las razitz de las dentz que no evasesca.	And the strain you apply with which to tighten the wire must be such that it does not cause the teeth to loosen.
E aprop inscindeys las extramitatz del fiel superfluens am las forceps o tosoyras, e agregua aquelas en quascun loc am gesti, e converteys aquelas e las occulta entre la dent sana e la dent mauguda, per so que no fassa lesio a la lengua.	And then cut the excess thread ends with forceps or scissors, and insert them at various points by gesture, and turn them and hide them between the healthy tooth and the damaged tooth, so as not to harm the tongue.
E aprop leyssa aquela ayssi streyta cum roman.	And then bind it tightly with a Roman bandage.
Mays si es desliada o rumpuda, strenh aquela o aquelas am autra fiel en tal manieyra en tot son temps.	If it becomes unfastened or torn, tighten it or those parts with another thread in such a way that they remain tight at all times.
E aquesta es la forma de las dentz e la figura de la rectacio de doas dentz sanas e de doas maugudas, ayssi cum vezes aquestas liadas:	And this is the form of the teeth and the shape of the correction of two healthy teeth and two damaged teeth, thus when these ligatures are tied:
E quan se fa que retorno una dent o doas aprop le cazement de quascuna en lors locs, e sian recrescutz ayssi cum havem recomtat, e que remauguan.	And when it is done so that a tooth or two returns to their proper place in their respective locations, and they are grown back as we have recomposed, then they become renewed.
E no fa aquo sino bo artifexs e savi.	And this is only achieved by skilled artisans and wise men.
E alcunas veguadas es aptat alcuna causa dels osses de vaca, e es fayt de lor ayssi cum forma de dent, e es pausada en loc en le qual defayl la dent, e es strengit ayssi cum havem dit, e reman e serveys am aquel per lonc temps.	Sometimes, it is found that the cause of this condition is a bone from a cow, shaped somewhat like a tooth, which is placed in the area where the tooth is missing, and held tight as we have said, remaining and serving in that position for a long time.
Capitol .xxxiv.	Chapter .XXXIV.
De inscizio del liament le qual ve en la lengua e prohibeys loquela.	On the knowledge of the ligament which is found in the tongue and prevents speech.
Aquest liguament le qual ve dejos la lengua alcunas veguadas o es natural am le qual hom nays, o accidental e accideys per plagua la qual ja es consolidada.	This ligament which is found in the tongue sometimes stops speech, either because it is a natural condition or due to an accident that occurs as a result of a plague which has already healed.
E la operacio en lu es que huobres la boca del malaute, le sieu cap existent en le tieu se; e eleva la sieua lengua, e aprop inscideys aquel liament nervos segon la latitut entro que sia solvuda la lengua de la sua recencio.	And the operation on it is to open the mouth of the patient, making its jaw no longer exist in place; raise their tongue, and then carefully cut that nerve ligament according to its width until the tongue is freed from its attachment.
Mays si en aquela es alcuna duricia o denodacio, e aquo es stat per consolidacio de plagua, lahoras tu gieta unci e scindeys aquel per la latitut entro que aias inscindit le liament e sia dissolvuda la nodacio.	If there is any stiffness or resistance in that area, which is due to the hardening of the disease, then you apply oil and split it apart with your fingers until you can separate the ligament and the knot is dissolved.
E guarda te que no sia fayta fissura en le preon de la carn e que scindas aqui arceria e vengua flux de sanc.	And be careful not to cause any rupture in the flesh, and split open the rear part, and let the pus flow out.
E aprop sia lavat le vestigi de la inscisio am ayguaros o am vi agre o am aygua frega; e aprop pausa dejos la lengua licini; so es meca la qual tengua le malaute dejos la lengua en quascuna nuoyt per so que no sia consolidat autra veguada.	Then, wash the dressing of the incision with hot water or vinegar or clean water; and place a cloth over it; it is best to keep the tongue out of the way during this time, as any pressure on it may harden the condition again.
Mays si accideys flux de sanc, pausa sobre le loc vetriol trissat; mays si le sanc ventz, lahoras cauteriza le loc am cauteri lantiginos le qual conveneys ad aquo.	If pus flows, apply vitriol to the area; if the pain is sharp, cauterize the area with a hot iron suitable for this condition.
E aprop aquel cura am las autras causas entro que sia sanat.	And then proceed with the treatment addressing the other causes until it is cured.
